Title: tupleModulo
Description: Returns a tuple of the moduli (remainders) of division operations of two tuples.
tuple_num: Tuple of numerator values. Tuple of numeric type.tuple_div: Tuple of modulus values. Tuple of numeric type.
Tuple of the remainders of division of tuple_num and tuple_div. Tuple of non-zero integer values.An error is thrown for division by zero.
